author: Cointelegraph by Ezra Reguerra
title: Bitcoin first, crypto at scale: Inside the UAE’s layered digital asset strategy
description: The UAE is separating Bitcoin infrastructure from crypto applications, letting Abu Dhabi and Dubai specialize in different stages of adoption.
content:
The United Arab Emirates is not choosing between Bitcoin and broader crypto. Instead, it is deliberately building both, in different cities and for different stages of adoption.
